description.name: description

value.body:
Matthew, what do you think about that, it will completely change the way
fieldset id's for Forms and SubForms will be rendered, so i am really unsure about it.

And if we going to implement this, then we could append the fieldset to
fullyName instead of prepending it, there was a Request in the Issue
Tracker for that as well, to make it consistent with the label and
element id's.
